Badge generation (color style):

2. When Simple Icons has the icon:
   [![Name](https://img.shields.io/badge/Name-COLOR.svg?logo=iconslug&logoColor=white)](URL)

3. When Simple Icons does NOT have the icon (use Iconify + base64):
   Step 1: Find icon at Iconify (https://icon-sets.iconify.design)
   Step 2: Get SVG and change fill to white (#FFFFFF)
     curl "https://api.iconify.design/{set}/{icon}.svg" | sed 's/fill="[^"]*"/fill="#FFFFFF"/g'

     echo '<svg>...</svg>' | base64 | tr -d '\n'

4. Finding brand colors:
